metadata.name: code-reviewer
metadata.description: Elite code review expert for Flask/Python job application system. Enforces CLAUDE.md standards, runs automated tools (Black, Flake8, Vulture), reviews security/performance, and documents findings. Use PROACTIVELY after code changes.

metadata.name: debugger
metadata.description: Analyzes bugs through systematic evidence gathering - use for complex debugging
Start the 3-phase task workflow (PRD → Tasks → Execution)

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Version bump type (patch, minor, or major)
